caption.p: Virus release from Kampo drug-treated, virus-infected cells. MDCK(+) cells were infected with influenza virus at an input m.o.i. of 0.2 or 5 and incubated in the media containing the designated concentrations of a Kampo drug. After 24 h, HA activities in the media were measured. Gray bars, m.o.i. = 0.2; black bars, m.o.i. = 5. (a) Maoto. (b) Kakkonto. (c) Jiinkokato. (d) Senkyuchachosan. (e) Bakumondoto.
